daggers.name: Toy Maker's Knife
daggers.lore: A precision blade used by master elves to carve intricate wooden toys. Deadly in the right hands.

daggers.name: Ornament Shard
daggers.lore: A jagged dagger made from a broken, reinforced holiday ornament. Surprisingly sharp.

daggers.name: Fish Dreger
daggers.lore: Shaped like a curved sickle, traditionally used for pulling in large fishing nets. Can be thrown like a boomerang.

daggers.name: Skewered Fruit Knife
daggers.lore: A short, sharp knife used for preparing delicate fruit skewers. Applies a minor paralyzing poison.

daggers.name: Hunter Bone Dagger
daggers.lore: A ceremonial dagger crafted from the first kill of a young Ice Elf hunter. Deals high critical damage.

daggers.name: Ice Sliver
daggers.lore: A pure shard of magical ice that never melts, used for quick, quiet assassinations.

daggers.name: Miniature Scissors
daggers.lore: Giant sewing scissors reduced in size and sharpened into two separate daggers.

daggers.name: Dart Tip
daggers.lore: A highly aerodynamic tip of a projectile dart, engineered for maximum throw distance.
